item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, September 25, 2024 at 8:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. NASA spacecraft to probe possibility of life in Europa's salty ocean (21 points | 2 comments)
2. Doom on a modified rotary phone (61 points | 20 comments)
3. FRED: New Zealand open-access and crowdsource database of fossil records (18 points | 3 comments)
4. Insights after 11 years with Datomic [video] (76 points | 4 comments)

6. Show HN: Hosting my website using my C web server (148 points | 47 comments)
7. On Impactful AI Research (167 points | 26 comments)
8. Furnace – the biggest multi-system chiptune tracker ever made (65 points | 14 comments)
9. Fedi Is for Losers (5 points | discuss)
10. Beyond the route: Introducing granular MTA bus speed data (175 points | 47 comments)
11. Gnome 47 Wallpapers (27 points | 3 comments)
12. Debian Packaging from First Principles (74 points | 14 comments)
13. Launch HN: Modern Realty (YC S24) – AI Real Estate Agent for Home Buyers (127 points | 249 comments)
14. Understudied protein blobs have global effects on cell biochemistry (35 points | 8 comments)
15. Why are the violins the biggest section in the orchestra? (36 points | 26 comments)
16. Why Most Published Research Findings Are False (2005) (158 points | 181 comments)
17. The Calculator that spawned the Microprocessor (2009) (78 points | 18 comments)

19. Twitter/X will let people you've blocked see your posts (204 points | 360 comments)
20. A Little History of the Anchovy (36 points | 11 comments)
21. G, a Statistical Myth (2007) (8 points | 1 comment)
22. Show HN: Velvet – Store OpenAI requests in your own DB (56 points | 29 comments)
23. Filtered for home robots, fast and slow (15 points | 4 comments)
24. GSoC'24: Differentiable Logic for Interactive Systems and Generative Music (78 points | 7 comments)
25. Show HN: OpenFreeMap – Open-Source Map Hosting (730 points | 202 comments)
26. Death of the Department Store (59 points | 69 comments)
27. Jupyter Kernel for Deno (8 points | discuss)
28. Ask HN: Platform for 11 year old to create video games? (57 points | 74 comments)
29. Working Turing Machine (70 points | 1 comment)
30. Wasm2Mpy: Compiling WASM to MicroPython so it can run on Raspberrys (66 points | 20 comments)
